name: Yellowstone General Stores (Delaware North)
location: Multiple park locations including Old Faithful, Canyon, Lake, and Mammoth
why_great: Official park stores with National Park Service-approved merchandise.
Wide selection of Yellowstone-branded apparel, books, magnets, and kid-friendly items.
Conveniently located at most major park hubs.

name: Old Faithful Inn Gift Shop
location: Inside the historic Old Faithful Inn
why_great: Iconic location inside a historic landmark.
Features hand-crafted goods and upscale regional art.
Great for one-of-a-kind Yellowstone mementos.

name: Canyon Village General Store
why_great: Modern store with clothing, snacks, books, and local crafts.
Easy stop while touring the Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone.
Known for great photo books and coffee mugs.

name: Yellowstone Forever Park Store at Albright Visitor Center
why_great: Operated by the official nonprofit partner of Yellowstone.
Funds go back into educational and conservation projects.
High-quality maps, educational gear, and park guides.

name: Lake Hotel Gift Shop
why_great: Elegant souvenir stop inside a historic hotel.
Specialty items including glassware and fine art prints.
Great for more refined and unique items.

name: West Yellowstone Trading Company
why_great: Large, family-friendly shop just outside the park entrance.
Wide selection of Yellowstone-themed gifts and humorous apparel.
Open year-round with good pricing and local flair.

name: Bear Den Gift Shop
why_great: Located just outside the North Entrance.
Known for friendly staff and kids’ toys and plush animals.
Affordable and relaxed atmosphere near Roosevelt Arch.

name: Jackalope Gifts
why_great: Classic western-themed shop on the way to Yellowstone.
Known for quirky souvenirs and fun t-shirts.
Great stop on your way into the park from the East Entrance.

name: Grand Prismatic Spring Boardwalk Store (Midway Geyser Basin)
why_great: Quick-stop souvenir options with stunning views.
Popular for photo magnets and water bottles.
Great spot to cool off and grab a Yellowstone-themed keepsake.

name: Tower-Roosevelt General Store
why_great: Less crowded than other shops with rustic feel.
Known for bison-themed gear and huckleberry snacks.
Scenic setting near wildlife hotspots.
